note.p: Education: Royal School, Armagh; Trinity College, Dublin. MA; ScD (Dublin)

Career: Assistant Science Master, Royal School, Armagh (1881); Assistant to Robert S Ball (FRS 1873), at Dunsink Observatory (1882-1892); Andrews Professor of Astronomy, Dublin; Astronomer Royal of Ireland (1892-1897); Radcliffe Observer, Oxford (1897-1923); died in a nursing home after a long illness
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1924 vol 106 pp ix-xii signed by F W D
